TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Form extends System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl

summary.span: 表示组成应用程序的用户界面的窗口或对话框。

span.span: Represents a window or dialog box that makes up an application's user interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是应用程序中显示的任何窗口的表示形式。A is a representation of any window displayed in your application. 类可用于创建标准、工具、无边框和浮动窗口。The class can be used to create standard, tool, borderless, and floating windows. 你还可以使用 类来创建模式窗口，如对话框。You can also use the class to create modal windows such as a dialog box. (MDI) 窗体的一种特殊形式的窗体，可以包含其他称为 MDI 子窗体的窗体。A special kind of form, the multiple-document interface (MDI) form, can contain other forms called MDI child forms. MDI 窗体是通过将属性设置 为来创建的 `true` 。An MDI form is created by setting the property to `true`. 通过将 属性设置为将包含子窗体的 mdi 父窗体来创建 mdi 子窗体。MDI child forms are created by setting the property to the MDI parent form that will contain the child form. 使用类中提供的属性 ，可以确定所创建的窗口或对话框的外观、大小、颜色和窗口管理功能。Using the properties available in the class, you can determine the appearance, size, color, and window management features of the window or dialog box you are creating. 属性允许您在标题栏中指定窗口的标题。The property allows you to specify the caption of the window in the title bar. 和 属性允许您在窗口显示时定义窗口的大小和位置。The and properties allow you to define the size and position of the window when it is displayed. 您可以使用 color 属性更改窗体上的所有控件的默认前景色。You can use the color property to change the default foreground color of all controls placed on the form. 、 和 属性允许你控制窗体是否可以在运行时最小化、最大化或调整大小。The , , and properties allow you to control whether the form can be minimized, maximized, or resized at run time. 除了属性外，还可以使用类的方法来处理窗体。In addition to properties, you can use the methods of the class to manipulate a form. 例如，可以使用 方法将窗体显示为模式对话框。For example, you can use the method to show a form as a modal dialog box. 可以使用方法将 窗体放置在桌面上。You can use the method to position the form on the desktop. 类的事件可用于 响应对窗体执行的操作。The events of the class allow you to respond to actions performed on the form. 激活窗体时，可以使用事件来执行一些操作，例如更新窗体控件中显示的数据。You can use the event to perform operations such as updating the data displayed in the controls of the form when the form is activated. 通过在类中放置一个名为的方法，可以在应用程序中将窗体用作起始类 `Main` 。You can use a form as the starting class in your application by placing a method called `Main` in the class. 在方法中， `Main` 添加创建和显示窗体的代码。In the `Main` method add code to create and show the form. 还需要将 `STAThread` 属性添加到方法，以便 `Main` 窗体运行。You will also need to add the `STAThread` attribute to the `Main` method in order for the form to run. 当启动窗体关闭时，应用程序也会关闭。When the starting form is closed, the application is also closed. 如果在 可见之前将属性设置为 `false` ， (例如， 在设计器) 将设置为 false， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualstu](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualstu-md.md)] 则 "最小化"、"最大化"、"关闭" 和 "系统" 按钮保持启用状态。If you set the property to `false` before the is visible (for example, setting to false in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualstu](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualstu-md.md)] designer), the minimize, maximize, close, and system buttons remain enabled. 如果在 可见后将设置为 `false` (例如，当发生 Load 事件) 时，将禁用按钮。If you set to `false` after the is visible (for example, when the Load event occurs), the buttons are disabled. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的新实例 ，并调用 方法将窗体显示为对话框。The following example creates a new instance of a and calls the method to display the form as a dialog box. 该示例设置 、、、、 和属性，将 窗体的外观和功能更改为对话框。The example sets the , , , , , and properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box. 该示例还使用 窗体的集合的方法 来添加两个 控件。The example also uses the method of the form's collection to add two controls. 该示例使用 属性在对话框的标题栏中显示 "帮助" 按钮。The example uses the property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box. [!code-cpp[Classic Form.AcceptButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.AcceptButton Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Form.AcceptButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.AcceptButton Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Form.AcceptButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.AcceptButton Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置当用户按 Enter 键时所单击的窗体上的按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets the button on the form that is clicked when the user presses the ENTER key.

value.span: ，表示要用作窗体的“接受”按钮的按钮。

span.span: An that represents the button to use as the accept button for the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以指定当用户在应用程序中按 ENTER 键时要发生的默认操作。This property enables you to designate a default action to occur when the user presses the ENTER key in your application. 分配给此属性的按钮必须是 当前窗体上的，或者位于当前窗体上的容器中。The button assigned to this property must be an that is on the current form or located within a container on the current form. 您可以使用此属性来允许用户在简单的窗体上快速导航，只需在操作完成时按 ENTER 键，而不是使用鼠标手动单击 "接受" 按钮即可。You can use this property to allow the user to quickly navigate a simple form by allowing them to simply press the ENTER key when they are finished instead of manually clicking the accept button with their mouse. 如果窗体上当前选定的控件截获 ENTER 键并对其进行处理，则可能不会激活 "接受" 按钮。The accept button might not be activated if the currently selected control on the form intercepts the ENTER key and processes it. 例如，如果选择此选项，则在控件中插入新的行字符时，多行文本框控件允许按 ENTER 键。For example, a multiline text box control allows the ENTER key to be pressed when it is selected to insert a new line character in the control. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的新实例 ，并调用 方法将窗体显示为对话框。The following example creates a new instance of a and calls the method to display the form as a dialog box. 该示例设置 、、、、 和属性，将 窗体的外观和功能更改为对话框。The example sets the , , , , , and properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box. 该示例还使用 窗体的集合的方法 来添加两个 控件。The example also uses the method of the form's collection to add two controls. 该示例使用 属性在对话框的标题栏中显示 "帮助" 按钮。The example uses the property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box. [!code-cpp[Classic Form.AcceptButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.AcceptButton Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Form.AcceptButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.AcceptButton Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Form.AcceptButton Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.AcceptButton Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Activates the form and gives it focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 激活窗体后，如果这是活动的应用程序，则会将其显示在前面，如果这不是活动的应用程序，它将会闪烁窗口标题。Activating a form brings it to the front if this is the active application, or it flashes the window caption if this is not the active application. 若要使此方法生效，窗体必须可见。The form must be visible for this method to have any effect. 若要确定应用程序中的活动窗体，请使用 属性或 属性（如果你的窗体位于多文档界面中 (MDI) 应用程序。To determine the active form in an application, use the property or the property if your forms are in a Multiple-document interface (MDI) application. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 和 成员。The following example demonstrates how to use the , and members. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个名为的窗体中， `Form1` 其中包含名为的按钮 `Button1` 和两个 `Label` 称为和的控件 `Label1` `Label2`To run the example, paste the following code in a form called `Form1` containing a button called `Button1` and two `Label` controls called `Label1` and `Label2`. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 当使用代码激活或用户激活窗体时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the form is activated in code or by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 当应用程序处于活动状态并且具有多个窗体时，活动窗体为具有输入焦点的窗体。When the application is active and has multiple forms, the active form is the form with the input focus. 不可见的窗体不能是活动窗体。A form that is not visible cannot be the active form. 激活可见窗体的最简单方法是单击该窗体或使用相应的键盘组合。The simplest way to activate a visible form is to click it or use an appropriate keyboard combination. 若要在运行时使用代码激活窗体，请调用 方法。To activate a form at run time using code, call the method. 您可以使用此事件来执行任务，例如根据窗体未激活时对窗体数据所做的更改来更新窗体的内容。You can use this event for tasks such as updating the contents of the form based on changes made to the form's data when the form was not activated. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 、 、 、 和 成员。The following example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and members. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个名为 Form1 的窗体中，其中包含一个名为 `Button1` 和的两个 控件 `Label1` `Label2` 。To run the example, paste the following code in a form called Form1 containing a called `Button1` and two controls called `Label1` and `Label2`. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `form` 参数已是活动的 MDI 子窗体，则该 方法只返回。If the `form` parameter is already the active MDI child form, then the method simply returns. 如果不 `form` 为 `null` ，则将其设置为活动的 MDI 子窗体。If `form` is not `null`, then it is set to be the active MDI child form. 无论 `form` 参数是否为 `null` ， 都会引发 事件。Whether the `form` parameter is `null` or not, raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法获取对当前活动窗体的引用，以便在窗体或其控件上执行操作。You can use this method to obtain a reference to the currently active form to perform actions on the form or its controls. 如果你的应用程序是 (MDI) 应用程序的多文档界面，请使用 属性获取当前活动的 MDI 子窗体。If your application is a multiple-document interface (MDI) application, use the property to obtain the currently active MDI child form. ## Examples 下面的示例获取活动窗体，并禁用窗体上的所有控件。The following example gets the active form and disables all the controls on the form. 该示例使用 窗体的集合来循环访问窗体上的每个控件并禁用控件。The example uses the collection of the form to iterate through each control on the form and disable the controls. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法来确定您的 MDI 应用程序中是否打开了任何 MDI 子窗体。You can use this method to determine whether there are any MDI child forms open in your MDI application. 你还可以使用此方法从 mdi 父窗口或应用程序中显示的另一窗体中对 MDI 子窗口执行操作。You can also use this method to perform operations on an MDI child window from its MDI parent form or from another form that is displayed in your application. 如果当前处于活动状态的窗体不是 MDI 子窗体，则可以使用 属性来获取对它的引用。If the currently active form is not an MDI child form, you can use the property to obtain a reference to it. ## Examples 下面的示例获取对活动 MDI 子窗体的引用，并遍历 窗体上的所有控件，并重置其 属性。The following example obtains a reference to the active MDI child form and loops through all controls on the form, resetting their properties. 此示例要求已创建了一个 MDI 父窗体并且此方法调用是从 MDI 父窗体中进行的。This example requires that an MDI parent form has been created and that this method call is being made from the MDI parent form. span.span: The that this form will own.

summary.span: 向此窗体添加附属窗体。

span.span: Adds an owned form to this form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分配给所有者窗体的窗体在调用方法前一直保持为拥有窗体 。The form assigned to the owner form remains owned until the method is called. 还可以通过将 属性设置为对其所有者窗体的引用来使窗体拥有另一个窗体。You can also make a form owned by another by setting the property with a reference to its owner form. 当窗体由其他窗体拥有时，它将与所有者窗体一起关闭或隐藏。When a form is owned by another form, it is closed or hidden with the owner form. 例如，请考虑名为的窗体 `Form2` ，该窗体由名为的窗体拥有 `Form1` 。For example, consider a form named `Form2` that is owned by a form named `Form1`. 如果 `Form1` 关闭或最小化， `Form2` 则也会关闭或隐藏。If `Form1` is closed or minimized, `Form2` is also closed or hidden. 拥有的窗体也从不会显示在其所有者窗体后面。Owned forms are also never displayed behind their owner form. 您可以使用 windows 拥有的窗体（如查找和替换窗口），在选择所有者窗体时，不应在所有者窗体后面显示这些窗体。You can use owned forms for windows such as find and replace windows, which should not be displayed behind the owner form when the owner form is selected. > [!NOTE] > 如果窗体是多文档界面 (MDI) 父窗体，则此属性将返回所有当前打开的 MDI 子窗体除外显示的窗体。If the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) parent form, this property returns all forms that are displayed with the exception of any MDI child forms that are currently open. 若要获取在 MDI 父窗体中打开的 MDI 子窗体，请使用 属性。To obtain the MDI child forms opened in an MDI parent form, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法将 窗体显示为其他窗体的附属窗体。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to display a form as an owned form of another form. 显示附属窗体后，您可以最大程度地减少其所有者窗体，并且拥有的窗体将最小化。Once the owned form is shown, you can minimize its owner form and the owned form will minimize with it. 该示例要求从窗体的其他事件或方法中调用该示例中的代码。The example requires that the code in the example is called from another event or method of a form. [!code-cpp[Form.AddOwnedForm#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.AddOwnedForm/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Form.AddOwnedForm#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.AddOwnedForm/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Form.AddOwnedForm#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.AddOwnedForm/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果更改了，此属性将自动设置为 `true` `Opacity` 。This property is automatically set to `true` if the `Opacity` is changed. 当使用属性设置窗体的不透明度时 `Opacity` ，窗体将对窗体上的对象进行分层。When the opacity of a form is set using the `Opacity` property, the form will layer objects on the form. 如果将属性设置 为，则 `false` 窗体将不会处于分层模式，这将提高窗体的显示性能。If you set the property to `false` the form will not be in layered mode which will improve the display performance of the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则在窗体上的任何控件位于窗体的工作区之外时，滚动条将显示在窗体上。If this property is set to `true`, scroll bars are displayed on the form if any controls are located outside the form's client region. 此外，当自动滚动为 on 时，窗体的工作区会自动滚动以使控件具有输入焦点。Additionally, when autoscrolling is on, the client area of the form automatically scrolls to make the control with input focus visible. 您可以使用此属性来防止用户在其视频分辨率设置设置为低分辨率时无法查看控件。You can use this property to prevent users from losing the ability to view controls when their video resolution settings are set to a low resolution. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来启用对窗体的工作区外部的控件的显示。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to enable the display of controls that are outsize the client area of a form. 该示例创建一个新窗体，并向 窗体添加一个控件。The example creates a new form and adds a control to the form. 该 控件定位在新窗体的客户端区域外部。The control is positioned outsize the client area of the new form. 将 属性设置为 true 可在窗体上显示滚动条，以允许用户滚动到控件。The property is set to true to display scroll bars on the form to enable the user to scroll to the control. 此示例要求在此示例中定义的方法从事件处理程序中的另一个窗体或其他方法中调用。This example requires that the method defined in this example is called from another form in an event handler or other method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 强制窗体调整大小以适应其内容。Use to force a form to resize to fit its contents. 窗体不会在 Visual Studio 窗体设计器中自动调整大小，而不管 和属性的值 。A form does not automatically resize in the Visual Studio forms designer, regardless of the values of the and properties. 窗体根据这两个属性的值在运行时正确地调整大小。The form correctly resizes itself at run time according to the values of these two properties. 与此相反，自定义在 设计时和运行时自动调整自身的大小。By contrast, a custom automatically resizes itself both at design time and at run time. 使用时，将遵循 和 属性，但 会忽略属性的当前值。When using , the and properties are respected, but the current value of the property is ignored. 使用 和 也将属性呈现为 多余的，因为无法缩小窗体以便在视图中隐藏其包含的控件。Using and also renders the property superfluous, as there is no way to shrink the form to hide its contained controls from view. 有关窗体在为时的行为方式的信息，请参阅枚举 `true` 。See the enumeration for information on how a form behaves when is `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用自动调整大小以适合其内容的代码创建的窗体。The following example shows a form created using code that automatically resizes to fit its contents. 运行时，窗体将显示 ， 用于输入 URL，以及 用于在用户的默认 Web 浏览器中显示该 url。When run, the form displays a , a for entering a URL, and a for displaying that URL inside of the user's default Web browser. 该示例使用将 包含的控件逐个布局。The example uses a to lay out the contained controls one after the other. 它还会设置 和 以适应其窗体的内容。It also sets the and to grow and shrink to fit the contents of its form. value.span: ，表示窗体的“取消”按钮。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗体的 "取消" 按钮是每当用户按 ESC 键时单击的按钮控件。The cancel button for a form is the button control that is clicked whenever the user presses the ESC key. 分配给此属性的按钮必须是 当前窗体上的，或者位于当前窗体上的容器中。The button assigned to this property must be an that is on the current form or located within a container on the current form. 使用此属性，可以指定当用户在应用程序中按 ESC 键时要发生的默认操作。This property allows you to designate a default action to occur when the user presses the ESC key in your application. 您可以使用此属性来允许用户在简单的窗体中快速导航，只需按 ESC 键即可关闭窗口而不提交更改，而不是使用鼠标手动单击 "取消" 按钮。You can use this property to allow the user to quickly navigate a simple form by allowing them to simply press the ESC key to close a window without committing changes instead of manually clicking the cancel button with their mouse. 如果窗体上的另一个控件截获 ESC 键，则不能正常工作。 may not work if another control on the form intercepts the ESC key. 例如，如果您 在窗体上打开了，则 ESC 将关闭 而不是关闭窗体。For example, if you have a open on your form, ESC will close the instead of closing the Form. 分配给的对象 必须在窗体上可见，否则按 ESC 键将不起作用。The object assigned to must be visible on the form, or else pressing the ESC key will have no effect. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的新实例 ，并调用 方法将窗体显示为对话框。The following example creates a new instance of a and calls the method to display the form as a dialog box. 该示例设置 、、、、 和属性，将 窗体的外观和功能更改为对话框。The example sets the , , , , , and properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box. 该示例还使用 窗体的集合的方法 来添加两个 控件。The example also uses the method of the form's collection to add two controls. 该示例使用 属性在对话框的标题栏中显示 "帮助" 按钮。The example uses the property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗体工作区的大小是不包括边框和标题栏的窗体的大小。The size of the client area of the form is the size of the form excluding the borders and the title bar. 窗体的工作区是窗体中可放置控件的区域。The client area of a form is the area within a form where controls can be placed. 在执行图形操作或调整窗体上的控件的大小和位置时，可以使用此属性来获取适当的维度。You can use this property to get the proper dimensions when performing graphics operations or when sizing and positioning controls on the form. 若要获取整个窗体的大小，请使用 属性或使用单独的属性 和 。To get the size of the entire form, use the property or use the individual properties and . > [!NOTE] > 当前无法使用应用程序设置绑定到此属性。You cannot currently bind to this property using application settings. 有关应用程序设置的详细信息，请参阅 [应用程序设置概述](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview)。For more information on application settings, see [Application Settings Overview](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview). ## Examples 下面的示例为窗体的事件创建事件处理程序 。The following example creates an event handler for the event of a form. 此事件处理程序使用 窗体的属性使 名为的控件 `button1` 填充窗体的整个工作区。The event handler uses the property of the form to make a control named `button1` fill the entire client area of the form. summary.span: 关闭窗体。

span.span: Closes the form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭窗体后，在该对象中创建的所有资源都将关闭并释放窗体。When a form is closed, all resources created within the object are closed and the form is disposed. 通过处理 事件并将 作为参数传递的的属性设置 为事件处理程序，可以防止在运行时关闭窗体。You can prevent the closing of a form at run time by handling the event and setting the property of the passed as a parameter to your event handler. 如果您正在关闭的窗体是您的应用程序的启动窗体，则您的应用程序将结束。If the form you are closing is the startup form of your application, your application ends. 当上未释放窗体时，这两种情况 `Close` 是 (1) 它是多文档界面 (MDI) 应用程序的一部分，并且窗体不可见; () 使用显示窗体 。The two conditions when a form is not disposed on `Close` is when (1) it is part of a multiple-document interface (MDI) application, and the form is not visible; and (2) you have displayed the form using . 在这些情况下，你将需要 手动调用来标记窗体的所有控件以进行垃圾回收。In these cases, you will need to call manually to mark all of the form's controls for garbage collection. > [!NOTE] > 当在 显示为无模式窗口的上调用方法时，不能调用 方法使窗体可见，因为窗体的资源已被释放。When the method is called on a displayed as a modeless window, you cannot call the method to make the form visible, because the form's resources have already been released. 若要隐藏窗体并使其可见，请使用 方法。To hide a form and then make it visible, use the method. > [!CAUTION] > 在2.0 之前 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] ， 调用方法退出应用程序时不会引发和事件。Prior to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0, the and events are not raised when the method is called to exit your application. 如果在必须执行的任何一个事件中都有验证代码，则应在 调用方法之前为每个打开的窗体分别调用方法 。If you have validation code in either of these events that must be executed, you should call the method for each open form individually before calling the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > .NET Framework 版本2.0 中的事件已过时; 请改用 事件。The event is obsolete in the .NET Framework version 2.0; use the event instead. 此事件在用户或窗体的方法关闭窗体后发生 。This event occurs after the form has been closed by the user or by the method of the form. 若要防止窗体关闭，请处理 事件，并将 传递到事件处理程序的的属性设置为 `true` 。To prevent a form from closing, handle the event and set the property of the passed to your event handler to `true`. 您可以使用此事件来执行任务，例如释放窗体使用的资源，并保存在窗体中输入的信息或更新其父窗体。You can use this event to perform tasks such as freeing resources used by the form and to save information entered in the form or to update its parent form. > [!CAUTION] > 调用方法退出应用程序时，不会引发和事件。The and events are not raised when the method is called to exit your application. 如果在必须执行的任何一个事件中都有验证代码，则应在 调用方法之前为每个打开的窗体分别调用方法 。If you have validation code in either of these events that must be executed, you should call the method for each open form individually before calling the method. 如果窗体为 MDI 父窗体，则在 引发 mdi 父窗体的事件之前，将引发所有 mdi 子窗体的事件 。If the form is an MDI parent form, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's event is raised. 此外，在 引发 mdi 父窗体的事件之前，将引发所有 mdi 子窗体的事件。In addition, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the event of the MDI parent form is raised. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 、 、 、 和 成员。The following example demonstrates how to use the , , , , and members. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个名为的窗体中， `Form1` 其中包含名为和的 `Button1` 两个 控件 `Label1` `Label2` 。To run the example, paste the following code in a form called `Form1` containing a called `Button1` and two controls called `Label1` and `Label2`. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FormsActivate/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 关闭窗体时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the form is closing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 从 .NET Framework 2.0 开始，事件已过时; 请改用 事件。The event is obsolete starting with the .NET Framework 2.0; use the event instead. 关闭窗体时发生事件。The event occurs as the form is being closed. 关闭窗体时，将释放在该对象中创建的所有资源并释放窗体。When a form is closed, all resources created within the object are released and the form is disposed. 如果取消此事件，窗体仍保持打开。If you cancel this event, the form remains opened. 若要取消窗体的关闭，请将 传递到事件处理程序的的属性设置为 `true` 。To cancel the closure of a form, set the property of the passed to your event handler to `true`. 当窗体显示为模式对话框时，单击 " **关闭** " 按钮 (窗体右上角带有 X 的按钮) 导致窗体隐藏并将 属性设置为 `DialogResult.Cancel` 。When a form is displayed as a modal dialog box, clicking the **Close** button (the button with an X at the upper-right corner of the form) causes the form to be hidden and the property to be set to `DialogResult.Cancel`. 当用户单击 "**关闭**" 按钮时，可以通过 在事件处理程序中为该窗体的事件设置属性，来重写分配给该属性的值 。You can override the value assigned to the property when the user clicks the **Close** button by setting the property in an event handler for the event of the form. > [!NOTE] > 当在 显示为无模式窗口的上调用方法时，不能调用 方法使窗体可见，因为窗体的资源已被释放。When the method is called on a displayed as a modeless window, you cannot call the method to make the form visible, because the form's resources have already been released. 若要隐藏窗体并使其可见，请使用 方法。To hide a form and then make it visible, use the method. > [!CAUTION] > 调用方法退出应用程序时，不会引发和事件。The and events are not raised when the method is called to exit your application. 如果在必须执行的任何一个事件中都有验证代码，则应在 调用方法之前为每个打开的窗体分别调用方法 。If you have validation code in either of these events that must be executed, you should call the method for each open form individually before calling the method. 如果窗体为 MDI 父窗体，则在 引发 mdi 父窗体的事件之前，将引发所有 mdi 子窗体的事件 。If the form is an MDI parent form, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's event is raised. 此外，在 引发 mdi 父窗体的事件之前，将引发所有 mdi 子窗体的事件。In addition, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the event of the MDI parent form is raised. 取消 mdi 子窗体的事件不会阻止 引发 mdi 父窗体的事件。Canceling the event of an MDI child form does not prevent the event of the MDI parent form from being raised. 但是，取消事件会将设置为 `true` 作为参数传递给父窗体的的属性。However, canceling the event will set to `true` the property of the that is passed as a parameter to the parent form. 若要强制关闭所有 MDI 父窗体和子窗体，请 `false` 在 MDI 父窗体中将属性设置为。To force all MDI parent and child forms to close, set the property to `false` in the MDI parent form. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例使用 来测试中的文本是否 已更改。The following example uses to test if the text in a has changed. 如果有，则会询问用户是否保存对文件所做的更改。If it has, the user is asked whether to save the changes to a file. [!code-cpp[Form.Closing#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.Closing/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Form.Closing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.Closing/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Form.Closing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.Closing/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 属性设置为 `true` ，则控件框显示在标题栏的右上角。If the property is set to `true`, the control box is displayed in the upper-right corner of the caption bar. 除了 "关闭" 按钮外，控件框还可以包括 "最小化"、"最大化" 和 "帮助" 按钮。The control box can include minimize, maximize, and help buttons in addition to a close button. 要使 `ControlBox` 属性生效，还必须将窗体的 属性设置为 、 、 或 。For the `ControlBox` property to have any effect, you must also set the form's property to , , , or . 如果将设置 为 `false` 并设置 属性，则 不会更新窗体的属性以反映窗体的非工作区已隐藏。If you set to `false` and also set the property, the property of the form is not updated to reflect that the non-client area of the form has been hidden. 若要解决此问题，请将更改属性的代码放 在 事件处理程序中。To fix this problem, put the code that alters the property in the event handler. > [!NOTE] > 如果设置为 `false` ， 属性对多文档界面不起作用 (MDI) 子窗体，在创建时最大化显示。When set to `false`, the property has no effect on a Multiple-document interface (MDI) child form that is displayed maximized at time of creation. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 、 、、 和 属性来创建没有边框或标题框的窗体。The following example uses the , , , , and properties to create a form that does not have any border or caption box. 在此示例中创建的窗体可用于创建应用程序的初始屏幕。The form created in this example could be used to create a splash screen for an application. 该示例要求在窗体类中定义示例的方法，并在初始化窗体时调用。The example requires that the example's method is defined in a form class and called when the form is being initialized. remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此事件来执行任务，例如，使用停用的窗体中的数据更新应用程序中的另一个窗口。You can use this event to perform tasks such as updating another window in your application with data from the deactivated form. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此成员。The following example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `Form1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Form1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 获取或设置 Windows 桌面上窗体的大小和位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the size and location of the form on the Windows desktop.

value.span: ，它使用桌面坐标表示 Windows 桌面上窗体的边界。

span.span: A that represents the bounds of the form on the Windows desktop using desktop coordinates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 桌面坐标基于屏幕上的工作区域，其中不包括任务栏。Desktop coordinates are based on the working area of the screen, which excludes the taskbar. 桌面的坐标系统基于像素。The coordinate system of the desktop is pixel-based. 如果你的应用程序在多个监视器系统上运行，则该窗体的坐标为组合桌面的坐标。If your application is running on a multiple monitor system, the coordinates of the form are the coordinates for the combined desktop. 您可以使用此属性来调整窗体的大小并相对于 Windows 桌面上的其他窗体或应用程序定位窗体。You can use this property to size and position a form relative to other forms or applications on the Windows desktop. ## Examples 下面的示例设置窗体的大小和位置，使窗体在桌面的左边缘和距桌面顶部50像素的位置定位为50像素。The following example sets the size and position of a form so that the form is positioned 50 pixels from the left border of the desktop and 50 pixels from the top of the desktop. 此示例要求在窗体类内定义方法。This example requires that the method is defined within a form class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 桌面坐标基于屏幕上的工作区域，其中不包括任务栏。Desktop coordinates are based on the working area of the screen, which excludes the taskbar. 桌面的坐标系统是基于像素的。The coordinate system of the desktop is pixel based. 如果你的应用程序在 multimonitor 系统上运行，则该窗体的坐标是组合桌面的坐标。If your application is running on a multimonitor system, the coordinates of the form are the coordinates for the combined desktop. 您可以使用此属性来相对于 Windows 桌面上的其他窗体和应用程序定位窗体。You can use this property to position your form relative to other forms and applications on the Windows desktop. 如果在 调用方法之前调用方法 ，则窗体将定位在其默认位置，该位置由操作系统确定。If you call the method before calling the method, your form will be positioned at its default location, which is determined by the operating system. 有关窗口定位的详细信息，请参阅 "窗口功能" 一文中的 [窗口大小和位置](/windows/win32/winmsg/window-features#window-size-and-position) 部分。For more information about window positioning, see the [Window Size and Position](/windows/win32/winmsg/window-features#window-size-and-position) section of the "Window Features" article. 如果在 调用后调用 ，则窗体将定位在指定的位置。If you call after calling , your form will be positioned at the location you specified. ## Examples 下面的示例设置窗体的位置，以使窗体在桌面的左边缘和距桌面顶部100像素的位置定位为100像素。The following example sets the position of a form so that the form is positioned 100 pixels from the left border of the desktop and 100 pixels from the top of the desktop. 此示例要求在窗体类内定义方法。This example requires that method has been defined within a form class. summary.span: 获取或设置窗体的对话框结果。

span.span: Gets or sets the dialog result for the form.

value.span: ，表示当窗体用作对话框时该窗体的结果。

span.span: A that represents the result of the form when used as a dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗体的对话框结果是在窗体显示为模式对话框时从窗体返回的值。The dialog result of a form is the value that is returned from the form when it is displayed as a modal dialog box. 如果窗体显示为对话框，则使用枚举中的值设置此属性 将设置窗体的对话框结果的值，隐藏模式对话框，并将控件返回给调用窗体。If the form is displayed as a dialog box, setting this property with a value from the enumeration sets the value of the dialog box result for the form, hides the modal dialog box, and returns control to the calling form. 此属性通常由 窗体上控件的属性设置。This property is typically set by the property of a control on the form. 当用户单击控件时 ，赋给的属性的值 将分配给该 窗体的属性。When the user clicks the control, the value assigned to the property of the is assigned to the property of the form. 当窗体显示为模式对话框时，单击 " **关闭** " 按钮 (窗体右上角具有 X 的按钮) 导致窗体隐藏并将 属性设置为 `DialogResult.Cancel` 。When a form is displayed as a modal dialog box, clicking the **Close** button (the button with an X in the top-right corner of the form) causes the form to be hidden and the property to be set to `DialogResult.Cancel`. 当用户单击对话框的 "**关闭**" 按钮或设置属性的值时，不会自动调用方法 。The method is not automatically called when the user clicks the **Close** button of a dialog box or sets the value of the property. 相反，窗体处于隐藏状态，并且可以在不创建对话框的新实例的情况下再次显示。Instead, the form is hidden and can be shown again without creating a new instance of the dialog box. 由于此行为，您必须 在应用程序不再需要窗体时调用窗体的方法。Because of this behavior, you must call the method of the form when the form is no longer needed by your application. 您可以使用此属性来确定如何关闭对话框，以便正确地处理在对话框中执行的操作。You can use this property to determine how a dialog box is closed in order to properly process the actions performed in the dialog box. > [!NOTE] > 当用户单击 "**关闭**" 按钮时，可以通过 在事件处理程序中为该窗体的事件设置属性，来重写分配给该属性的值 。You can override the value assigned to the property when the user clicks the **Close** button by setting the property in an event handler for the event of the form. > [!NOTE] > 如果 作为无模式窗口显示，则由属性返回的值 可能不会返回分配给窗体的值，因为窗体关闭时窗体的资源会自动释放。If a is displayed as a modeless window, the value returned by the property might not return a value assigned to the form because the form's resources are automatically released when the form is closed. ## Examples 下面的示例将窗体显示为对话框，并显示一个消息框，指示窗体的 "确定" 或 "取消" 按钮是否是通过引用 窗体的属性单击的。The following example displays a form as a dialog box and displays a message box indicating whether the OK or Cancel button of the form was clicked by referencing the property of the form. [!code-cpp[Classic Form.DialogResult Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.DialogResult Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Form.DialogResult Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.DialogResult Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Form.DialogResult Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.DialogResult Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗体的边框样式确定窗体的外边缘如何显示。The border style of the form determines how the outer edge of the form appears. 除了更改窗体的边框显示，某些边框样式还可防止调整窗体的大小。In addition to changing the border display for a form, certain border styles prevent the form from being sized. 例如， `FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog` 边框样式会将窗体的边框更改为对话框的边框，并防止调整窗体的大小。For example, the `FormBorderStyle.FixedDialog` border style changes the border of the form to that of a dialog box and prevents the form from being resized. 边框样式还可影响窗体的标题栏部分的大小或可用性。The border style can also affect the size or availability of the caption bar section of a form. > [!NOTE] > 使用 样式，无需将窗口大小调整到一定的最小值，即使将设置 为 `false` 并将零长度字符串分配给 。With the style, it is impossible to resize the window below a certain minimum value, even if you have set to `false` and assigned a zero-length string to . 请考虑使用样式来解决此操作 。Consider working around this by using the style instead. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的新实例 ，并调用 方法将窗体显示为对话框。The following example creates a new instance of a and calls the method to display the form as a dialog box. 该示例设置 、、、、 和属性，将 窗体的外观和功能更改为对话框。The example sets the , , , , , and properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box. 该示例还使用 窗体的集合的方法 来添加两个 控件。The example also uses the method of the form's collection to add two controls. 该示例使用 属性在对话框的标题栏中显示 "帮助" 按钮。The example uses the property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box. summary.span: 关闭窗体后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the form is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 事件在用户或类的方法或方法关闭窗体后发生 。The event occurs after the form has been closed by the user or by the method or the method of the class. 若要防止窗体关闭，请处理 事件，并将 传递到事件处理程序的的属性设置为 `true` 。To prevent a form from closing, handle the event and set the property of the passed to your event handler to `true`. 您可以使用此事件来执行任务，例如释放窗体使用的资源，并保存在窗体中输入的信息或更新其父窗体。You can use this event to perform tasks such as freeing resources used by the form and to save information entered in the form or to update its parent form. 如果窗体是多文档界面 (MDI) 父窗体，则在 引发 mdi 父窗体的事件之前，将引发所有 mdi 子窗体的事件 。If the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) parent form, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's event is raised. 同样，在 引发 mdi 父窗体的事件之前，将引发所有 mdi 子窗体的事件。Likewise, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the event of the MDI parent form is raised. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此成员。The following example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `Form1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Form1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#395](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#395)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#395](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#395)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event FormClosing As FormClosingEventHandler

summary.span: 关闭窗体前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the form is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭窗体时发生事件。The event occurs as the form is being closed. 关闭窗体时，将释放与窗体关联的所有资源。When a form is closed, it is disposed, releasing all resources associated with the form. 如果取消此事件，窗体仍保持打开。If you cancel this event, the form remains opened. 若要取消窗体的关闭，请将 传递到事件处理程序的的属性设置为 `true` 。To cancel the closure of a form, set the property of the passed to your event handler to `true`. 当窗体显示为模式对话框时，单击 " **关闭** " 按钮 (窗体右上角带有 X 的按钮) 导致窗体隐藏并将 属性设置为 `DialogResult.Cancel` 。When a form is displayed as a modal dialog box, clicking the **Close** button (the button with an X at the upper-right corner of the form) causes the form to be hidden and the property to be set to `DialogResult.Cancel`. 当用户单击 "**关闭**" 按钮时，可以通过 在事件处理程序中为该窗体的事件设置属性，来重写分配给该属性的值 。You can override the value assigned to the property when the user clicks the **Close** button by setting the property in an event handler for the event of the form. > [!NOTE] > 当在 显示为无模式窗口的上调用方法时，不能调用 方法使窗体可见，因为窗体的资源已被释放。When the method is called on a displayed as a modeless window, you cannot call the method to make the form visible, because the form's resources have already been released. 若要隐藏窗体并使其可见，请使用 方法。To hide a form and then make it visible, use the method. 如果窗体是多文档界面 (MDI) 父窗体，则在 引发 mdi 父窗体的事件之前，将引发所有 mdi 子窗体的事件 。If the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) parent form, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's event is raised. 同样，在 引发 mdi 父窗体的事件之前，将引发所有 mdi 子窗体的事件。Likewise, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the event of the MDI parent form is raised. 取消 mdi 子窗体的事件不会阻止 引发 mdi 父窗体的事件。Canceling the event of an MDI child form does not prevent the event of the MDI parent form from being raised. 但是，取消事件会将设置为 `true` 作为参数传递给父窗体的类的属性。However, canceling the event will set to `true` the property of the class that is passed as a parameter to the parent form. 若要强制关闭所有 MDI 父窗体和子窗体，请 `false` 在 MDI 父窗体中将属性设置为。To force all MDI parent and child forms to close, set the property to `false` in the MDI parent form. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此成员。The following example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `Form1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Form1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为时 `true` ，" **关闭** " 按钮左侧的标题栏中将显示一个带问号的小按钮。When this property is set to `true`, a small button with a question mark appears in the caption bar to the left of the **Close** button. 此按钮可用于显示应用程序的帮助。You can use this button to display help for your application. 可以为事件创建事件处理程序， 以便在单击窗体的 "帮助" 按钮时向用户显示帮助信息。You can create an event handler for the event to display Help information to the user when the Help button of the form is clicked. 若要显示 "帮助" 按钮，窗体的属性的值 必须为 `true` ，其默认值为。To display a Help button, the value of the form's property must be `true`, its default value. 属性确定标题栏的右上角是否包含控件，如 "最大化" 按钮、"最小化" 按钮、"帮助" 按钮和 "关闭" 按钮。The property determines whether the upper-right corner of the caption bar contains controls such as a maximize button, a minimize button, a help button, and a close button. 此外，还必须将窗体的属性设置 为 、 、 或 。In addition, you must also set the form's property to , , , or . > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果显示**最大化**或**最小化**按钮，则忽略属性的值。The value of the property is ignored if the **Maximize** or **Minimize** buttons are shown. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的新实例 ，并调用 方法将窗体显示为对话框。The following example creates a new instance of a and calls the method to display the form as a dialog box. 该示例设置 、、、、 和属性，将 窗体的外观和功能更改为对话框。The example sets the , , , , , and properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box. 该示例还使用 窗体的集合的方法 来添加两个 控件。The example also uses the method of the form's collection to add two controls. 该示例使用 属性在对话框的标题栏中显示 "帮助" 按钮。The example uses the property to display a Help button in the caption bar of the dialog box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件发生在对窗体进行输入语言更改之前。This event occurs before the change of input language is made for the form. 可以通过将 传递到事件处理程序的的属性设置为来取消语言更改 `false` 。You can cancel the language change by setting the property of the passed to your event handler to `false`. 如果取消该事件，则不会更改输入语言。If the event is canceled, the input language is not changed. 你可以使用此事件来确定请求的输入语言更改是否适用于你的应用程序。You can use this event to determine whether the requested input language change is appropriate for your application. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此成员。The following example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `Form1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Form1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，MDI 子窗体显示在 MDI 父窗体的工作区中。At run time, MDI child forms are displayed inside the client area of an MDI parent form. MDI 子窗体可以在 MDI 父窗体内最大化、最小化和移动。An MDI child form can be maximized, minimized, and moved within the MDI parent form. 若要创建 MDI 子窗体，请将 将为 mdi 父窗体的指定为 子窗体的属性。To create an MDI child form, assign the that will be the MDI parent form to the property of the child form. 您可以使用 属性来确定窗体是否为 MDI 父窗体。You can use the property to determine whether a form is an MDI parent form. 您可以使用 属性来确定由方法或属性返回的窗体是应用程序中的 MDI 子窗体还是标准窗体，如对话框。You can use the property to determine whether a form returned by a method or property is an MDI child form or a standard form in your application such as a dialog box. > [!NOTE] > 所有 MDI 子窗体都具有可调整大小的边框、控件菜单框、最小化和 **最大化** 按钮，而不考虑 、 、 和属性的设置 。All MDI child forms have sizable borders, a control-menu box, and Minimize and **Maximize** buttons, regardless of the settings of the , , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将窗体的显示和行为更改为 MDI 父窗体。This property changes the display and behavior of the form to an MDI parent form. 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则窗体将显示具有凸起边框的凹陷工作区。When this property is set to `true`, the form displays a sunken client area with a raised border. 分配给父窗体的所有 MDI 子窗体都显示在其工作区中。All MDI child forms assigned to the parent form are displayed within its client area. 当关闭 MDI 父窗体时，在 引发 mdi 父窗体的事件之前，将引发所有 mdi 子窗体的事件 。When an MDI parent form is closed, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the MDI parent form's event is raised. 此外，在 引发 mdi 父窗体的事件之前，将引发所有 mdi 子窗体的事件。In addition, the events of all MDI child forms are raised before the event of the MDI parent form is raised. > [!NOTE] > 如果 MDI 子窗体上有两个控件，则将设置 为以 `true` 使父窗体仅合并其中一个控件的内容 。If there are two controls on an MDI child form, setting to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the controls. 用于 合并 MDI 父窗体上的其他子控件的内容。Use to merge the contents of additional child controls on the MDI parent form. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性以及更改 `BackColor` MDI 窗体的属性。The following example demonstrates using the property as well as changing the `BackColor` property of an MDI Form. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到新窗体中。To run this example, paste the following code in a new form. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MdiClientExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MdiClientExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MdiClientExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MdiClientExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否 授予权限。The property determines whether the permission is granted. 此属性在运行时在窗体的构造函数中设置，在窗体的生存期内缓存。This property is set at run time in the form's constructor, and is cached for the lifetime of the form. Windows 窗体在部分信任环境中运行的应用程序无法避开此项检查，因为公共语言运行时确保始终在部分信任环境中调用父构造函数。Windows Forms applications running in partial trust cannot circumvent this check, as the common language runtime ensures that the parent constructor is always called in partial trust.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在将键事件传递到具有焦点的控件前，窗体是否将接收此键事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the form will receive key events before the event is passed to the control that has focus.

value.span: 如果窗体将接收所有键事件，则为 ；如果窗体上当前选定控件接收键事件，则为 。

span.span: if the form will receive all key events; if the currently selected control on the form receives key events.

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为时 `true` ，窗体将接收所有 、 和 事件。When this property is set to `true`, the form will receive all , , and events. 在窗体的事件处理程序处理完击键后，会将击键分配给具有焦点的控件。After the form's event handlers have completed processing the keystroke, the keystroke is then assigned to the control with focus. 例如，如果将 属性设置为， `true` 并且当前选定的控件为，则在该 控件的事件处理程序处理击键后， 控件将接收按下的键。For example, if the property is set to `true` and the currently selected control is a , after the keystroke is handled by the event handlers of the form the control will receive the key that was pressed. 若要仅在窗体级别处理键盘事件，而不允许控件接收键盘事件，请将 窗体的事件处理程序中的属性设置 为 `true` 。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not allow controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in your form's event handler to `true`. 您可以使用此属性来处理应用程序中的大多数击键，并处理击键或调用相应的控件来处理击键。You can use this property to process most keystrokes in your application and either handle the keystroke or call the appropriate control to handle the keystroke. 例如，当应用程序使用函数键时，您可能希望在窗体级别处理击键，而不是为可能接收击键事件的每个控件都编写代码。For example, when an application uses function keys, you might want to process the keystrokes at the form level rather than writing code for each control that might receive keystroke events. > [!NOTE] > 如果窗体没有可见或启用的控件，则它会自动接收所有键盘事件。If a form has no visible or enabled controls, it automatically receives all keyboard events. > [!NOTE] > 可以对窗体上的控件进行编程以取消其收到的任何击键。A control on a form may be programmed to cancel any keystrokes it receives. 由于控件绝不会将这些键击发送到窗体，因此无论的设置如何，窗体都不会看到它们 。Since the control never sends these keystrokes to the form, the form will never see them regardless of the setting of . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将窗体的 属性设置为 true，并在窗体级别处理键事件。The following example demonstrates setting a form's property to true and handling the key events at the form level. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到空白窗体中。To run the example, paste the following code in a blank form. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法在 MDI 父窗体中排列 MDI 子窗体，以便更轻松地导航和操作 MDI 子窗体。You can use this method to arrange the MDI child forms in your MDI parent form to allow for easier navigation and manipulation of MDI child forms. MDI 子窗体可以在 MDI 父窗体中水平、垂直、级联或作为图标平铺。MDI child forms can be tiled horizontally and vertically, cascaded, or as icons within the MDI parent form. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 MDI 应用程序的父窗体中窗口菜单菜单项的事件处理程序。The following example shows the event handlers for the menu items of a Window menu in an MDI application's parent form. 每个事件处理程序都调用 方法，以安排当前在应用程序中打开的所有子窗体。Each event handler makes calls to the method to arrange any child forms that are currently open in the application. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过 " **最大化** " 按钮，用户可以将窗口放大到全屏大小。A **Maximize** button enables users to enlarge a window to full-screen size. 若要显示 " **最大化** " 按钮，窗体的 属性的值必须为 `true` ，其默认值为。To display a **Maximize** button, the value of the form's property must be `true`, its default value. 属性确定标题栏的右上角是否包含控件，如 "最大化" 按钮、"最小化" 按钮、"帮助" 按钮和 "关闭" 按钮。The property determines whether the upper-right corner of the caption bar contains controls such as a maximize button, a minimize button, a help button, and a close button. 此外，还必须将窗体的属性设置 为 、 、 或 。In addition, you must also set the form's property to , , , or . 最 **大化按钮在** 窗口最大化时自动变为 "还原" 按钮。A **Maximize** button automatically becomes a restore button when a window is maximized. 最小化或还原窗口会自动将 "还原" 按钮改回 " **最大化** " 按钮。Minimizing or restoring a window automatically changes the restore button back to a **Maximize** button. > [!NOTE] > 在运行时最大化窗体将生成一个 事件。Maximizing a form at run time generates a event. 属性反映窗口的当前状态。The property reflects the current state of the window. 如果将属性设置 为 `FormWindowState.Maximized` ，则窗体将被最大化，而不会影响 和属性的设置 。If you set the property to `FormWindowState.Maximized`, the form is maximized independently of whatever settings are in effect for the and properties. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的新实例 ，并调用 方法将窗体显示为对话框。The following example creates a new instance of a and calls the method to display the form as a dialog box. 该示例设置 、、、、 和属性，将 窗体的外观和功能更改为对话框。The example sets the , , , , , and properties to change the appearance and functionality of the form to a dialog box. 该示例还使用 窗体的集合的方法 来添加两个 控件。The example also uses the method of the form's collection to add two controls. 该示例使用 属性在对话框的标题栏中显示 "帮助" 按钮。The example uses the property to display a help button in the caption bar of the dialog box. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要创建 MDI 子窗体，请将 将为 mdi 父窗体的指定为 子窗体的属性。To create an MDI child form, assign the that will be the MDI parent form to the property of the child form. 可以从 MDI 子窗体使用此属性来获取所有子窗体所需的全局信息，或调用对所有子窗体执行操作的方法。You can use this property from an MDI child form to obtain global information that all child forms need or to invoke methods that perform actions to all child forms. > [!NOTE] > 如果 MDI 子窗体上有两个控件，则将设置 为以 `true` 使父窗体仅合并其中一个控件的内容 。If there are two controls on an MDI child form, setting to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the controls. 用于 合并 MDI 父窗体上的其他子控件的内容。Use to merge the contents of additional child controls on the MDI parent form. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在 MDI 应用程序中创建子窗体。The following example demonstrates how to create child forms in an MDI application. 示例代码创建一个窗体，该窗体包含唯一文本来标识子窗体。The example code creates a form with unique text to identify the child form. 该示例使用 属性指定窗体为子窗体。The example uses the property to specify that a form is a child form. 此示例要求在示例中的代码从其属性设置为的窗体中调用 `true` ，并且该窗体具有名为的私有类级别整数变量 `childCount` 。This example requires that the code in the example is called from a form that has its property set to `true` and that the form has a private class level integer variable named `childCount`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当窗体以模式模式显示时，除了模式窗体上的对象之外，不 (键盘或鼠标单击) 可能发生。When a form is displayed modally, no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the modal form. 程序必须隐藏或关闭模式窗体 (通常是为了响应某些用户操作) ，然后才能向另一个窗体进行输入。The program must hide or close a modal form (usually in response to some user action) before input to another form can occur. 在应用程序中，按模式显示的窗体通常用作对话框。Forms that are displayed modally are typically used as dialog boxes in an application. 您可以使用此属性来确定是否已按模式显示从方法或属性获取的窗体。You can use this property to determine whether a form that you have obtained from a method or property has been displayed modally. 若要按模式显示窗体，请使用 方法。To display a form modally use the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性来确定窗体是否显示为模式窗体。The following example uses the property to determine if a form is displayed as a modal form. 如果不是，则 更改属性，使窗体成为具有工具窗口边框的非顶级窗体。If it is not the and properties are changed to make the form a non-top-level form with a tool window border. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 重写此方法是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。Overriding this method is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Opacity { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Opacity : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置窗体的不透明度级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the opacity level of the form.

value.span: 窗体的不透明度级别。

span.span: The level of opacity for the form.

value.span: 默认值为 1.00。

span.span: The default is 1.00.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以指定窗体及其控件的透明度级别。The property enables you to specify a level of transparency for the form and its controls. 如果将此属性的值设置为小于 100% (1.00) ，则整个窗体（包括边框）将变得更加透明。When this property is set to a value less than 100 percent (1.00), the entire form, including borders, is made more transparent. 如果将此属性的值设置为 0% (0.00) 会使窗体完全不可见。Setting this property to a value of 0 percent (0.00) makes the form completely invisible. 您可以使用此属性来提供不同的透明度级别，或提供各种效果，如逐步取消窗体在视图中的显示方式。You can use this property to provide different levels of transparency or to provide effects such as phasing a form in or out of view. 例如，你可以通过将 属性设置为 0% (0.00) 的值将窗体分阶段，并逐渐增加该值，直到达到 100% (1.00) 。For example, you can phase a form into view by setting the property to a value of 0 percent (0.00) and gradually increasing the value until it reaches 100 percent (1.00). 不同于提供的透明度 ，如果窗体及其控件的颜色与在属性中指定的值相同，则只会使窗体及其控件完全透明 。 differs from the transparency provided by , which only makes a form and its controls completely transparent if they are the same color as the value specified in the property. 当为时，不支持此属性 `true` 。This property is not supported when is `true`. 属性取决于分层 WINDOWS API。The property depends on the Layered Windows API. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [分层窗口](/windows/win32/winmsg/window-features#layered-windows)。For more information, see [Layered Windows](/windows/win32/winmsg/window-features#layered-windows). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个窗体，该窗体的不透明度级别为75%。The following example demonstrates how to create a form that is displayed with an opacity level of 75 percent. 它将创建一个新窗体，该窗体位于屏幕的中心，并 将属性设置为更改窗体的不透明度级别。It creates a new form that is positioned in the center of the screen with an property set to change the opacity level of the form. 该示例还将 属性设置为提供的窗体大小大于窗体的默认大小。The example also sets the property to provide a larger sized form than the default size of the form. 此示例假定 `CreateMyOpaqueForm` 方法是从事件处理程序或其他方法中的另一个窗体调用的。This example assumes that the `CreateMyOpaqueForm` method is called from another form in an event handler or other method. [!code-cpp[Form.Opacity#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.Opacity/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Form.Opacity#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.Opacity/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Form.Opacity#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.Opacity/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OwnedForms As Form()
public: property cli::array <System::Windows::Forms::Form ^> ^ OwnedForms { cli::array <System::Windows::Forms::Form ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 对象的数组，这些对象表示此窗体拥有的所有窗体。

span.span: Gets an array of objects that represent all forms that are owned by this form.

value.span: 数组，它表示此窗体的附属窗体。

span.span: A array that represents the owned forms for this form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回一个数组，该数组包含此窗体拥有的所有窗体。This property returns an array that contains all forms that are owned by this form. 若要使窗体成为其他窗体所拥有的窗体，请调用 方法。To make a form owned by another form, call the method. 分配给所有者窗体的窗体在调用方法之前将保持为拥有 。The form assigned to the owner form will remain owned until the method is called. 还可以通过将 属性设置为对其所有者窗体的引用来使窗体拥有另一个窗体。You can also make a form owned by another by setting the property with a reference to its owner form. 当窗体由其他窗体拥有时，它将与所有者窗体一起关闭或隐藏。When a form is owned by another form, it is closed or hidden with the owner form. 例如，请考虑名为的窗体 `Form2` ，该窗体由名为的窗体拥有 `Form1` 。For example, consider a form named `Form2` that is owned by a form named `Form1`. 如果 `Form1` 关闭或最小化， `Form2` 则也会关闭或隐藏。If `Form1` is closed or minimized, `Form2` is also closed or hidden. 拥有的窗体也从不会显示在其所有者窗体后面。Owned forms are also never displayed behind their owner form. 您可以使用 windows 拥有的窗体（如查找和替换窗口），在选择所有者窗体时，不应在所有者窗体后面显示这些窗体。You can use owned forms for windows such as find and replace windows, which should not be displayed behind the owner form when the owner form is selected. > [!NOTE] > 如果窗体是多文档界面 (MDI) 父窗体，则此属性将返回除当前打开的所有 MDI 子窗体外显示的所有窗体。If the form is a multiple-document interface (MDI) parent form, this property will return all forms that are displayed with the exception of any MDI child forms that are currently open. 若要获取在 MDI 父窗体中打开的 MDI 子窗体，请使用 属性。To obtain the MDI child forms opened in an MDI parent form, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来修改所有者窗体拥有的所有窗体。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to modify all forms owned by the owner form. 该示例中的第一个方法将窗体添加到与附属窗体关联的附属窗体数组。The first method in the example adds forms to the array of owned forms associated with the owned form. 第二种方法遍历所有拥有的窗体并更改标题。The second method loops through all owned forms and changes the caption. 此示例要求两个方法都由事件或窗体的其他方法调用。This example requires that both methods are called by an event or other method of a form. [!code-cpp[Form.OwnedForms#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.OwnedForms/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Form.OwnedForms#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.OwnedForms/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Form.OwnedForms#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.OwnedForms/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置拥有此窗体的窗体。

span.span: Gets or sets the form that owns this form.

value.span: ，表示作为此窗体的所有者的窗体。

span.span: A that represents the form that is the owner of this form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使窗体成为其他窗体所拥有的窗体，请为其 属性指定对将成为所有者的窗体的引用。To make a form owned by another form, assign its property a reference to the form that will be the owner. 当窗体由其他窗体拥有时，它将与所有者窗体一起关闭或隐藏。When a form is owned by another form, it is closed or hidden with the owner form. 例如，请考虑名为的窗体 `Form2` ，该窗体由名为的窗体拥有 `Form1` 。For example, consider a form named `Form2` that is owned by a form named `Form1`. 如果 `Form1` 关闭或最小化， `Form2` 则也会关闭或隐藏。拥有的窗体也从不会显示在其所有者窗体后面。If `Form1` is closed or minimized, `Form2` is also closed or hidden.Owned forms are also never displayed behind their owner form. 您可以使用 windows 拥有的窗体（如查找和替换窗口），在选择所有者窗体时，这些窗体不会消失。You can use owned forms for windows such as find and replace windows, which should not disappear when the owner form is selected. 若要确定父窗体拥有的窗体，请使用 属性。To determine the forms that are owned by a parent form, use the property.

exception.span: 顶级窗口不能具有所有者。

span.span: A top-level window cannot have an owner.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ResizeBegin As EventHandler

summary.span: 窗体进入大小调整模式时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a form enters resizing mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户开始调整窗体大小时，通常通过单击并拖动窗体右下角的一个边框或大小调整手柄来引发事件。The event is raised when the user begins to resize a form, typically by clicking and dragging one of the borders or the sizing grip located on the lower-right corner of the form. 此操作使窗体成为模式大小循环，直到调整大小操作完成。This action puts the form into a modal sizing loop until the resize operation is completed. 通常，在调整大小操作过程中将发生以下一组事件：Typically, the following set of events occurs during a resize operation: 1. 当 窗体进入大小调整模式时，将发生单个事件。A single event occurs as the form enters resizing mode. 2. 当修改窗体时，将发生零个或多对和事件 。Zero or more pairs of and events occur as the form's is modified. 3. 当 窗体退出大小调整模式时，将发生单个事件。A single event occurs as the form exits resizing mode. > [!NOTE] > 只需在边框上单击而不拖动，调整手柄就会生成 和 事件，而无需任何中间 和 事件对。Just clicking without dragging on a border or resizing grip will generate the and events without any intermediate and event pairs. 当用户移动窗体时，通常会在标题栏上单击并拖动，同时引发和对事件。The and pair of events is also raised when the user moves the form, typically by clicking and dragging on the caption bar. 此类事件不是通过编程方式操作生成的，例如，通过更改 或 属性。These events are not generated by programmatic manipulation of the form, for example by changing the or properties. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此成员。The following example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `Form1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Form1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 属性主要适用于为全球受众开发全球通用窗体。The property is primarily useful for developing world-ready forms for worldwide audiences. 许多窗体的设计使控件按从左到右的方式放置在窗体上。Many forms are designed so that controls are laid out on a form in a left-to-right fashion. 这些表单与遵循这种书写方向的语言兼容。These forms are compatible with languages that follow this writing direction. 但是，当您向从右到左的语言的用户显示相同的窗体时，通常最好反转窗体上控件的顺序。However, when you display the same forms to users of right-to-left languages, it is often preferable to reverse the order of the controls on the form. 如果 和 属性都为 `true` ，则将为窗体打开镜像，并且控件位置和文本流将从右到左。If both the and properties are `true`, mirroring will be turned on for the form, and control placement and text flow will be right-to-left. 与不同 ，不 继承。Unlike , does not inherit. 如果希望它对子控件生效，则必须在每个要镜像的子控件上进行设置。If you want it to take effect for child controls, you must set it on each child control that you want mirrored. 当设置为时，不支持所有者描述 `Yes` 。Owner draw is not supported when is set to `Yes`. 所有者绘制事件仍将发生，但未定义你在这些事件中创作的任何代码的行为。The owner draw events will still occur, but the behavior of any code you author in these events is not defined. 此外， 不支持、、、 和绘制事件。Additionally, , , , and the painting events are not supported. 和 属性将导致设置以下 Windows API 窗口样式：The and properties cause the following Windows API window styles to be set: - 如果将 设置为 `Yes` 并 将设置为 `true` ，则 Windows 窗体设置 `WS_EX_LAYOUTRTL` 窗口样式，并删除 `WS_EX_RIGHT` 和 `WS_EX_RTLREADING` 样式。When is set to `Yes` and is set to `true`, Windows Forms sets the `WS_EX_LAYOUTRTL` window style, and removes the `WS_EX_RIGHT` and `WS_EX_RTLREADING` styles. - 如果将 设置为 `Yes` ，但设置为 `No` ，则 Windows 窗体设置 `WS_EX_RIGHT` 和 `WS_EX_RTLREADING` 窗口样式。When is set to `Yes` but is set to `No`, Windows Forms sets the `WS_EX_RIGHT` and `WS_EX_RTLREADING` window styles. 更改此属性的值会引发 事件。Changing the value of this property raises the event. 有关全球化问题的详细信息，请参阅 [开发全球通用应用程序的最佳实践](/dotnet/standard/globalization-localization/best-practices-for-developing-world-ready-apps)。For more information about globalization issues, see [Best Practices for Developing World-Ready Applications](/dotnet/standard/globalization-localization/best-practices-for-developing-world-ready-apps).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法来显示非模式窗体。You can use this method to display a non-modal form. 使用此方法时， 窗体的属性将设置为 `owner` 。When you use this method, the property of the form is set to `owner`. 非模式窗体可以使用 属性来获取有关所属窗体的信息。The non-modal form can use the property to get information about the owning form. 调用此方法与设置 非模式的属性，然后调用 方法相同。Calling this method is identical to setting the property of the non-modal and then calling the method. 显示窗体等效于将属性设置 为 `true` 。Showing the form is equivalent to setting the property to `true`. 调用方法后， 属性返回值， `true` 直到 调用方法为止。After the method is called, the property returns a value of `true` until the method is called.

summary.span: 将窗体显示为模式对话框。

span.span: Shows the form as a modal dialog box.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法在应用程序中显示模式对话框。You can use this method to display a modal dialog box in your application. 如果调用此方法，则在对话框关闭后才会执行它后面的代码。When this method is called, the code following it is not executed until after the dialog box is closed. 可以通过将枚举的一个值分配 给 窗体上的的属性或 在代码中设置窗体的属性，来为该对话框赋值。The dialog box can be assigned one of the values of the enumeration by assigning it to the property of a on the form or by setting the property of the form in code. 此方法随后将返回此值。This value is then returned by this method. 您可以使用此返回值确定如何处理对话框中发生的操作。You can use this return value to determine how to process the actions that occurred in the dialog box. 例如，如果对话框已关闭并 `DialogResult.Cancel` 通过此方法返回值，则可能会阻止调用后的代码 执行。For example, if the dialog box was closed and returned the `DialogResult.Cancel` value through this method, you could prevent code following the call to from executing. 当窗体显示为模式对话框时，单击 " **关闭** " 按钮 (窗体右上角带有 X 的按钮) 导致窗体隐藏并将 属性设置为 `DialogResult.Cancel` 。When a form is displayed as a modal dialog box, clicking the **Close** button (the button with an X at the upper-right corner of the form) causes the form to be hidden and the property to be set to `DialogResult.Cancel`. 与非模式窗体不同， 当用户单击对话框的关闭窗体按钮或设置属性的值时，.NET Framework 不会调用方法 。Unlike non-modal forms, the method is not called by the .NET Framework when the user clicks the close form button of a dialog box or sets the value of the property. 改为隐藏窗体，而无需创建新的对话框实例即可显示该窗体。Instead the form is hidden and can be shown again without creating a new instance of the dialog box. 由于显示为对话框的窗体是隐藏的，而不是关闭的，因此 当您的应用程序不再需要窗体时，您必须调用窗体的方法。Because a form displayed as a dialog box is hidden instead of closed, you must call the method of the form when the form is no longer needed by your application. 此版本的 方法不会将窗体或控件指定为其所有者。This version of the method does not specify a form or control as its owner. 调用此版本时，当前活动窗口将成为该对话框的所有者。When this version is called, the currently active window is made the owner of the dialog box. 如果要指定特定的所有者，请使用此方法的其他版本。If you want to specify a specific owner, use the other version of this method. ## Examples 下面的示例在确定是否读取 对话框窗体上控件的值之前，将窗体显示为模式对话框并计算对话框的返回值。The following example displays a form as a modal dialog box and evaluates the return value of the dialog box before determining whether to read the value of a control on the dialog box form. 此示例要求 创建命名的 `testDialog` ，并且它包含一个名为的 控件 `TextBox1` 。This example requires that a named `testDialog` is created and that it contains a control named `TextBox1`. 此外，该示例还要求包含本示例中的代码，并将其从其他中调用， 以便显示 `testDialog` 为模式对话框。Furthermore, the example requires that code in this example is contained and called from a different in order to display `testDialog` as a modal dialog box. 该示例使用为 对话框指定所有者的版本。The example uses the version of that specifies an owner for the dialog box. [!code-cpp[Classic Form.ShowDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ShowDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Form.ShowDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ShowDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Form.ShowDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ShowDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法在应用程序中显示模式对话框。You can use this method to display a modal dialog box in your application. 如果调用此方法，则在对话框关闭后才会执行它后面的代码。When this method is called, the code following it is not executed until after the dialog box is closed. 可以通过将值分配 给 窗体上的的属性或 在代码中设置窗体的属性，来为对话框分配一个值。The dialog box can be assigned one of the values of by assigning it to the property of a on the form or by setting the property of the form in code. 此方法随后将返回此值。This value is then returned by this method. 您可以使用此返回值确定如何处理对话框中发生的操作。You can use this return value to determine how to process the actions that occurred in the dialog box. 例如，如果对话框已关闭并 `DialogResult.Cancel` 通过此方法返回值，则可能会阻止调用后的代码 执行。For example, if the dialog box was closed and returned the `DialogResult.Cancel` value through this method, you could prevent code following the call to from executing. 当窗体显示为模式对话框时，单击 " **关闭** " 按钮 (窗体右上角带有 X 的按钮) 导致窗体隐藏并将 属性设置为 `DialogResult.Cancel` 。When a form is displayed as a modal dialog box, clicking the **Close** button (the button with an X at the upper-right corner of the form) causes the form to be hidden and the property to be set to `DialogResult.Cancel`. 与无模式窗体不同， 当用户单击对话框的关闭窗体按钮或设置属性的值时，.NET Framework 不会调用方法 。Unlike modeless forms, the method is not called by the .NET Framework when the user clicks the close form button of a dialog box or sets the value of the property. 改为隐藏窗体，而无需创建新的对话框实例即可显示该窗体。Instead the form is hidden and can be shown again without creating a new instance of the dialog box. 由于显示为对话框的窗体是隐藏的，而不是关闭的，因此 当您的应用程序不再需要窗体时，您必须调用窗体的方法。Because a form displayed as a dialog box is hidden instead of closed, you must call the method of the form when the form is no longer needed by your application. 此版本的 方法允许您指定特定的窗体，该窗体将拥有显示的对话框。This version of the method allows you to specify a specific form that will own the dialog box that is shown. ## Examples 下面的示例在确定是否读取 对话框窗体上控件的值之前，将窗体显示为模式对话框并计算对话框的返回值。The following example displays a form as a modal dialog box and evaluates the return value of the dialog box before determining whether to read the value of a control on the dialog box form. 此示例要求 创建命名的 `Form2` ，并且它包含一个名为的 控件 `TextBox1` 。This example requires that a named `Form2` is created and that it contains a control named `TextBox1`. 该示例使用为 对话框指定所有者的版本。The example uses the version of that specifies an owner for the dialog box. [!code-cpp[Classic Form.ShowDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ShowDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Form.ShowDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ShowDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Form.ShowDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Form.ShowDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含一个 值，该值指示窗体在 窗体的标题栏中是否显示。The property contains a value that indicates whether the form's is displayed in the caption bar of the form. 如果 属性为 `false` ，则图标和控件框都将被取消。If the property is `false`, both the icon and control box will be suppressed. 如果 `false` 当显示主窗体时，将在应用程序的任务栏按钮中显示通用图标。If is `false` when the primary form is shown, a generic icon will be displayed in the taskbar button for the application. 如果设置为，则此属性不起作用 。This property has no effect if is set to . 在这种情况下，窗体不会显示图标。In that case, the form does not display an icon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果窗体是其他窗体中的父级，则不会在 Windows 任务栏中显示父级窗体。If a form is parented within another form, the parented form is not displayed in the Windows taskbar. 可以使用此属性来防止用户通过 Windows 任务栏选择窗体。You can use this property to prevent users from selecting your form through the Windows taskbar. 例如，如果您在应用程序中显示 "查找和替换" 工具窗口，则您可能希望阻止通过 Windows 任务栏选择该窗口，因为您需要同时显示应用程序的主窗口和 "查找和替换" 工具窗口才能适当地处理搜索。For example, if you display a Find and Replace tool window in your application, you might want to prevent that window from being selected through the Windows taskbar because you would need both the application's main window and the Find and Replace tool window displayed in order to process searches appropriately. 创建具有样式的窗体时，通常需要使用此属性 。You will often wish to use this property when creating a form with the style. 设置 样式并不能单独保证窗口不会显示在任务栏中。Setting the style does not alone guarantee that a window will not appear in the taskbar. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性生成一个不在 Windows 任务栏中显示的对话框。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to make a dialog box that is not displayed in the Windows taskbar. [!code-cpp[Form.ShowInTaskbar#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.ShowInTaskbar/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Form.ShowInTaskbar#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.ShowInTaskbar/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Form.ShowInTaskbar#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Form.ShowInTaskbar/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 只要窗体是首次显示就发生。

span.span: Occurs whenever the form is first displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在第一次显示窗体时才引发事件; 然后，最小化、最大化、还原、隐藏、显示或无效和重画将不会引发此事件。The event is only raised the first time a form is displayed; subsequently minimizing, maximizing, restoring, hiding, showing, or invalidating and repainting will not raise this event. 有关窗体事件顺序的详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体中事件的顺序](/dotnet/framework/winforms/order-of-events-in-windows-forms)。For more information about the order of events of a form, see [Order of Events in Windows Forms](/dotnet/framework/winforms/order-of-events-in-windows-forms). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此成员。The following example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `Form1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `Form1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#403](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#403)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#403](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#403)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要显示顶级窗口，但不希望通过从当前窗口中获取输入焦点来中断用户的工作，请使用此属性。Use this property if you want to show a top-level window, but don't want to interrupt a user's work by taking the input focus away from the current window. 这可能是一个信息性弹出窗口或浮动窗口，如画图应用程序中的工具面板。This can be an informational pop-up window or a floating window, such as a Tools palette in the Paint application. 由于此属性是只读的，因此您只能通过 在您自己的窗体中重写并对其进行编程以返回来更改其值 `true` 。Because this property is read-only, you can only change its value by overriding in your own form, and programming it to return `true`. 如果非激活的窗口需要使用 UI 控件，则应考虑使用 控件，如 。If your non-activated window needs to use UI controls, you should consider using the controls, such as . 这些控件是无窗口的，并且在选定时不会导致窗口激活。These controls are windowless, and will not cause a window to activate when they are selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许同时设置窗体) 的高度和宽度 (，而不是 分别设置和 属性。This property allows you to set both the height and width (in pixels) of the form at the same time instead of setting the and properties individually. 如果要设置窗体的大小和位置，则可以使用 属性来调整窗体的大小和位置，也可以使用类的 属性基于 屏幕坐标设置窗体的大小和位置。If you want to set the size and location of a form, you can use the property to size and locate the form based on desktop coordinates or use the property of the class to set the size and location of the form based on screen coordinates. > [!NOTE] > 此属性的最大值限制为窗体在其上运行的屏幕的分辨率。The maximum value of this property is limited by the resolution of the screen on which the form runs. 对于每个屏幕维度，该值不能大于12个像素 (水平 + 12 和垂直 + 12) 。The value cannot be greater than 12 pixels over each screen dimension (horizontal + 12 and vertical + 12). > [!NOTE] > 在 Pocket PC 设备上，可以通过将设置 为 `None` 并删除任何控件来创建可调整大小的窗口 。On Pocket PC devices, you can create a resizable window by setting to `None` and removing any control. 在 SmartPhone 设备上，永远不能调整大小 -它将始终填充整个屏幕。On SmartPhone devices, you can never resize a - it will always fill the entire screen. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个窗体，该窗体的不透明度级别为75%。The following example demonstrates how to create a form that is displayed with an opacity level of 75 percent. 示例代码创建一个新窗体，该窗体位于屏幕的中心，并 将属性设置为更改窗体的不透明度级别。The example code creates a new form that is positioned in the center of the screen with an property set to change the opacity level of the form. 示例代码还将属性设置 为提供的窗体大小大于窗体的默认大小。The example code also sets the property to provide a larger sized form than the default size of the form. 此示例要求在此示例中定义的方法从事件处理程序中的另一个窗体或其他方法中调用。This example requires that the method defined in this example is called from another form in an event handler or other method. summary.span: 获取或设置运行时窗体的起始位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the starting position of the form at run time.

value.span: ，表示窗体的起始位置。
